body:
Hi. You scrub's must all be willing to be my peasants... No. Anyways, If you didn't know already, I used to make resource packs... long long ago. Until my laptop started being fat, and kept crashing PhotoShop.... But I got a new PC, so I hope everything will be fixed.
Now if anyone remembers my "RP request" thread, where there were a TON of requests for packs. That's when my motivation got destroyed and my PC kept crashing. So I waited.... 10 minutes later, 5-6 months* later, I kinda got back into it. So here we go:

Fault Pack (Project in progress)
 *16x16
    *Version [1]
       * Overview / Review / Video
          * Songs:
               * Witt Lowry - Wake Up (Prod. Dan Haynes)
      * Download
      * Adfly
      * Adfocus
      * Progress / Log:
             * Completed : Inventory , Fixed broken Pixels , 1.8 compatibility , 12% Average decrease in performance , 64x64 Blocks , Custom Swords , Custom bow , Custom Bow Pull-back , UHC intended [But not ready] , MCSG Intended [But not ready] , Avicus Intended , Pot Intended [But not ready] , Soup Intended [But not ready] , Custom sky , Low fire , Custom Particles , Custom Lighting.

    *Version [1.1]
       * Overview / Review / Video
      * Download
      * Progress / Log:
             * Fixing lag , Decreasing performance drag to 10% , Custom tools , Custom food , Improved Inventory , Flared Swords , Avicus ; MCSG ready , Fishing rod offset to 1.8 , Fixed broken Pixels.

title: Resrouce Packs?... Question Mark

replies.body: Make one that gives me 0% performance decrease and we'll talk 8-)
replies.body_tagged: Make one that gives me 0% performance decrease and we'll talk 8-)
